name: ciagneis-2D PlatformerFinal
description:
Modifications Added:

1) Changed most of the assets --> 2 new players,  collectibles, different tile map,  additional environment objects.

2) Level 1: A pink, puzzle oriented level that features tricky jumps,  platforms, keys and doors along with a few new obstacles.

3) Level 2: A nature, parkour oriented level that includes different gameplay and focuses on player movement. 

4) Various changes like adding a saw obstacle, spikes, new bird enemy, moving slime, menu/UI changes, and different music across all 3 scenes.
